name: Ayane Shirakawa
text:
Trample
When Ayane Shirakawa enters the battlefield or attacks, create a Tentacle token under an opponent's control. 
{2}{w}, {t}: Put a +1/+1 counter on Ayane Shirakawa. If an opponent controls three or more Tentacle tokens, instead put two +1/+1 counters and gain 2 life.
